rows.label: tlk41200123_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Driver's Code, Rule One!
Be kind to everyone, and
strive to be friends!

rows.label: tlk41200123_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Hello! This is the code
for becoming a Driver.

rows.label: tlk41200123_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Yup! My teacher said that to
resonate with a Core Crystal,
you must first train yourself!

rows.label: tlk41200123_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Someone with a rich heart
is more likely to resonate
with a good Blade!

rows.label: tlk41200123_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Driver's Code, Rule Two! If you see
someone in trouble, help them out!
